r.d: The purpose of this driver is to provide exceptionally thin glue between MongoDB and PHP, implementing only fundemental and performance-critical components necessary to build a fully-functional MongoDB driver.
r.n: * PHPC-667: Fix check for existing "_id" field during BulkWrite::insert() * PHPC-657: Support MONGOC_NO_AUTOMATIC GLOBALS configure flag * PHPC-657: Upgrade libbson and libmongoc to 1.3.5 * PHPC-655: Use case insensitive parsing for Manager connectTimeoutMS array option * PHPC-564: Use macros for accessing write result int32 fields * PHPC-564, PHPC-626: WriteResult should use libmongoc's public API * Fix title for PHPC-155 regression test
